item.description:
RELEASE INFO: * Fix rare instance where Irony falsely identified definition usage in game (in instances where multiple definitions were present in the game mod in different files)
CHANGES FROM v1.7: * Various bugfixes * Upgrade dependencies * Show more information in hash report and optimize performance by switching to listbox controls * Hopefully fix GUI corruption in linux workspaces (without upgrading avalonia to latest version) * Update Stellaris parser map for Stellaris v2.8
